```{r}
library(dplyr)

future_collection<-read_csv('all_commodities_futures_collection.csv')

future_collection<-future_collection%>%na.omit()
```


```{r}
head(future_collection)
```

```{r}

future_collection <- future_collection %>%
  select(commodity, category,date, open, high, low, close, volume)

future_collection$date <- as.Date(future_collection$date)
summary(future_collection)

ggplot(future_collection, aes(x= date, y=close)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs (title = "Commodities Prices over time", x = "Date", y = "Close")
```


```{r}
#basic forecasting

install.packages("TTR")
library(TTR)
future_collection$SMA_30 <- SMA(future_collection$close, n= 50)
```
